retrieval.storage.index.properties

Interface PicturePropertiesIndex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KyotoCabinetPropertiesIndexSingleFile, SimpleHashMapPropertiesIndex

    public interface PicturePropertiesIndex
    This interface allow to implement methods for a Picture index Format: id ===> properties
